==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han simp|蠭}}. {{Han compound|虫|t1=insect|夆|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a kind of insect.

===Etymology===
Sino-Tibetan; cognate with {{cog|bo|བུང་བ||bee}}. May be ultimately of onomatopoeic origin. Compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*huŋ|*ʔu(ə)ŋ ~ hu(ə)ŋ|bee, wasp, hornet}}, whence {{cog|vi|ong||bee}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=fēng
|c=fung1
|h=pfs=phûng/s:fûng
|md=pŭng
|mn=phang/hong
|mn_note=phang - vernacular; hong - literary
|w=1fon
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}

{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{w|Apoidea}} ([[wasp]]s and [[bee]]s)
